name.japanese: トムズ ワーカーズ

members.joinCircumstances: Founded the shipbuilding company on Scrap Island near Water 7.
Tom found 10-year-old Cutty Flam abandoned on Scrap Island and took him in as an apprentice.
Trained as Tom's apprentice alongside Franky.
Worked with Tom's Workers and assisted with the Sea Train project.
Kept as a pet, friend, and mascot of Tom's Workers.

keyMoments.title: Tom's Workers Introduced
keyMoments.description: Tom's Workers is revealed as the legendary shipbuilding company where Tom trained Franky and Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: The company built some of the most important ships in One Piece history, including the Oro Jackson and the Sea Train.

keyMoments.title: Sea Train Project Begins
keyMoments.description: Tom's Workers takes on the monumental task of building the Sea Train to save Water 7 and earn Tom's pardon.
keyMoments.significance: This project becomes the company's greatest achievement and Tom's lasting legacy.

keyMoments.title: Sea Train Maiden Voyage Success
keyMoments.description: After ten years of work, Tom's Workers successfully completes the Puffing Tom, which makes its maiden voyage.
keyMoments.significance: The successful completion of the Sea Train proves Tom's genius and saves Water 7 from economic collapse.

ships.description: The legendary ship built by Tom for Gol D. Roger that carried the Pirate King on his journey to find the One Piece.
The revolutionary Sea Train that runs on water, built over ten years to save Water 7 and earn Tom's pardon.

jollyRoger.description: Not applicable - Tom's Workers is a shipbuilding company, not a pirate crew
